definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

pinyin: bu4 wan2 quan2 gui1 na4 tui1 li3
wan2 quan2 gui1 na4 tui1 li3

sentences.english: Inductive reasoning moves from specific details to broader generalizations.
sentences.chinese: 歸納推理是從具體中歸納普遍的規律。

sentences.english: You can use inductive reasoning to find the next terms in a sequence.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使用歸納推理來求一列數中的各次項。

sentences.english: Decision tree learning is one of the widely used and practical methods for inductive inference.
sentences.chinese: 決策樹學習是應用最廣泛的歸納推理算法之一。
所有歸納推理都是一種猜測。

sentences.english: He emphasized the use of inductive reasoning in the pursuit of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他強調，使用歸納推理在追求知識。

sentences.english: This paper studies the rational problem of general inductive reasoning and nonmonotonic reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了一般歸納推理與非單調推理的合理性問題。

sentences.english: Distinguish between inductive and deductive reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 區分歸納推理和演繹推理。
